law.catch_line: Essex Agricultural And Technical Institute; Independent Agricultural And Technical School
law.text: [Text of section effective until July 1 preceding the opening of the Essex North Shore agricultural and technical school. Repealed by 2004, 463, Sec. 1. See 2004, 463, Sec. 18 as amended by 2010, 130, Sec. 7.] The Essex agricultural and technical institute shall be an independent agricultural and technical school pursuant to this chapter. The Bristol and Norfolk county agricultural high schools shall not become an independent agricultural and technical school pursuant to this chapter.
